title: Level Up Capsule Bug
body: I leveled up from 37 to 38 and didn't get a capsule. I don't own all the champs and was hoping to get most from this but now I'm concerned.  I googled it and it seems to be an ongoing issue. I tried to report a bug but the tool was not working from the client. I submitted a ticket for that and got a response from a bot. lol I just want my capsule.

replies.body: Thank you so much! You're so awesome!
Also, I can't post anywhere but here because my board level is too low? How does one go about leveling in the boards?
